item.title: How do i make a object give xp?
item.dc:creator: @Hyphy_Guy Hyphy Guy
item.description:
@Hyphy_Guy wrote:

Hey Pie it’s Not A Hax, but heres how you make objects give exp.
You see this:
case 2873:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Attack !”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2068);
addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[0]), 0);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

The case number is supposed to be the objects id so just replace the case id with the object id and tell me what happens.

Read full topic
